entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
